Welcome back big fella, did you buy a PC finally ? :-)

Acetate would be too harsh I suspect, maybe a soft cloth and a gentle 
detergent  and lot's of elbow grease ?.

Cheers

Rich



Tom Helm wrote:

> All-
>       Yes yes, I'm back thank you very much, no applause please. Here 
> is a
> kodogu question for the group. How does one remove SUMI, as in india
> ink, from iron, without of course damaging the patina. Sitting here
> with a tsuba in my back pocket and my enquirin' mind wants to know...
> -t
